    Utils.askOption(Class<E> enumClass)
    Read an option (blocking) The enum names will be converted by the `enumToOption` method and used as a prompt.

    Utils.askOptionOrEvent(Class<E> enumClass, boolean doPrint, boolean isHost, boolean isTurn)
    Read an option or wait for an event The enum names will be converted by the `enumToOption` method and used as a prompt.
    private <E extends Enum<E> & OptionsInterface>
    String
    Utils.enumToOption(E e)
    Convert an enum to a string The enum name has to be underscore separated words.
